param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the reference genome

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: ref_file
param.label: Use the following dataset as the reference sequence
param.help: You can upload a FASTA or FASTQ sequence to the history and use it as reference

macros.token: *getPercentReferencePerBase* is designed to generate x4 bigWig files from a BAM file representing the percent of aligned bases at each position with 1. the same base as the reference sequence at that position 2. a mismatch relative to the reference sequence at that position 3. a deletion relative to the reference sequence at that position 4. an insertion relative to the reference sequence at that position
